import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Check, Eye, EyeOff, HeartPulse } from "lucide-react"; import Header from "./Header"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const RegisterCard = () => { const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(0); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState(""); const [error, setError] = useState(""); // Dropdown states const [selectedState, setSelectedState] = useState("West Bengal"); const [cities, setCities] = useState([]); const states = { "West Bengal": ["Kolkata", "Asansol"], Bihar: ["Patna", "Gaya"], Jharkhand: ["Ranchi", "Jamshedpur"], Odisha: ["Bhubaneswar", "Cuttack"], }; useEffect(() => { setCities(states[selectedState] || []); }, [selectedState]); // OTP handling (simple simulation) const [otpSent, setOtpSent] = useState({ mobile: false, aadhaar: false }); const [otpVerified, setOtpVerified] = useState({ mobile: false, aadhaar: false, }); const [verifying, setVerifying] = useState({ mobile: false, aadhaar: false }); const sendOtp = (target) => { setOtpSent((prev) => ({ ...prev, [target]: true })); }; const verifyOtp = (target) => { setVerifying((prev) => ({ ...prev, [target]: true })); setTimeout(() => { setOtpVerified((prev) => ({ ...prev, [target]: true })); setVerifying((prev) => ({ ...prev, [target]: false })); }, 1500); }; const steps = ["Personal Details", "Verification", "Secure Account"]; const nextStep = () => setCurrentStep((prev) => Math.min(prev + 1, 2)); const prevStep = () => setCurrentStep((prev) => Math.max(prev - 1, 0)); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("✅ Account created successfully!"); }; return ( <>

Already have an account?{" "} Login Here

); }; export default RegisterCard;
